thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Shibao Co cuts FY Net Profit Attributable Forecast to RMB31.7 Mln-RMB50.8 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Shibao Co cuts FY Net Profit Attributable Forecast to RMB31.7 Mln-RMB50.8 Mln
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Shibao Co Ltd:
* REFERS TO ANNOUNCEMENT ON FY NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE EXPECTED BETWEEN RMB44.4 MILLION AND RMB63.5 MILLION​
* ‍EXPECTS THAT ITS NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS FOR YEAR OF 2017 WILL BE BETWEEN RMB31.7 MILLION AND RMB50.8 MILLION​​
* ‍EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO DELAY EXECUTION OF CERTAIN EXPORT BUSINESSES BY CLIENTS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
